Hi John,

I followed your knockout tutorial in pluralsight with the CodeCamper app. I really like the UOW en repository setup of the project.

Now I want to create unit tests. I can simply replace the Name of the DbContext so I have an integration test with a real db. That works fine.

I would like to do something like: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dn314431.aspx

This isn’t possible with the EFRepository of CodeCamper. Is the EFRepository not the best way to go with EF6 because of the use of DbContext Set en Entry()?

thank you for some remarks on it
